PHP Vulnerabilties

In this section we will cover some PHP vulnerabilities that we can find in some CTF challenges. Most of them are exploitable PHP functions.

The only thing that you need to know here the are the PHP basics that you can find here: What is PHP?. You don't really need to do a first program, but knowing some syntax will help us a lot. That's all, let's go to the learning section.
